backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user cards with access control, storage mixins, card creation, retrieval, and sale‑price updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key behaviors and responsibilities of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, actor initialization, profile loading, timeout handling, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog for adding cards with free‑text rarity, autocomplete fields, validation, and mutation to create new cards.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Autocomplete input component that filters suggestions and displays a dropdown list, closing when clicking outside.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Renders a card with rarity styling, price formatting, and actions for editing, selling, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal showing crafted cards with rarity badges, formatted data, and purchase details.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Dialog for editing a card’s fields, syncing form state to the selected card and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary that displays a fallback UI with error details and a reset option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication controls, user greeting, and app title.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save a profile name on first use.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog component for selling or trading a card, with form inputs, rarity styling, and actions to mark cards as sold or record trades.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal displaying sold and traded cards with profit/loss calculations, filtering, and expandable trade details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for Google authentication hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading/storing identities and exposing login and logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, cards, transactions, and mutations communicating with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: CardsPage loads user cards, builds filter options, applies multiple filters, and displays filtered card items with an add-card dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: PortfolioPage aggregates investment metrics, transaction statistics, and sold/crafted card data, rendering a detailed portfolio dashboard with modal views.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Provides utilities to extract unique card field values and filter them for autocomplete suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabled plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, issues, and pending requests for UI cleanup and performance improvements.
